name: poison-fang
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user bites the foe with toxic fangs. It may also leave the foe badly poisoned.
flavor_text.platinum: The user bites the foe with toxic fangs. It may also leave the foe badly poisoned.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user bites the foe with toxic fangs. It may also leave the foe badly poisoned.
